channel.title: Alerts Feed
channel.description: Alerts Feeds -- Los Angeles Fire Department

item.description: Knockdown - Greater Alarm Fire; INC#1521; 10:05PM; 901 E New Dock St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3DZwG6m; #SanPedro; 68 LAFD Firefighters took just 46 minutes in defensive firefighting operations to extinguish heavy fire in a 100' x 100' open roofed metal-clad industrial building at "SA Recycling Terminal Island" ( https://www.sarecycling.com/yard/sa-recycling-terminal-island ) a metal recycling firm on Terminal Island, at least 200 yards from the waterline at the Port of Los Angeles. The burning materials appear to be metal scrap and other debris, apparently related to automobile recycling. No injury. No evacuation. Fire cause under investigation.; FS 40; Batt 6; South Bureau; Council District 15; BC13 BC4 BC6 BT17 BT2 BT3 CM20 CM22 E112 E238 E248 E285 E36 E38 E40 E49 EM13 RA112 RA36 SO1 T38 T48 T85; CH7; 13 14; Brian Humphrey

Update Greater Alarm Fire; INC#1521; 09:52PM; 901 E New Dock St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3DZwG6m; #SanPedro; Though 68 LAFD Firefighters are now assigned by land and sea, the defensive firefight against heavy flames - at what is now described as a 100' x 100' open roofed metal-clad industrial building at a metal recycling firm on Terminal Island, is being handled by land based firefighters. The burning materials appear to be metal and other recycling debris.; FS 40; Batt 6; South Bureau; Council District 15; BC13 BC4 BC6 BT17 BT2 BT3 CM20 CM22 E112 E238 E248 E285 E36 E38 E40 E49 EM13 RA112 RA36 SO1 T38 T48 T85; CH7; 13 14; Brian Humphrey

Greater Alarm Fire; INC#1521; 09:19PM; 901 E New Dock St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3DZwG6m; #SanPedro; PRELIM: Defensive firefighting operations by land-based firefighters against heavy fire inside a 50' x 75' metal-clad industrial building at a metal recycling firm on Terminal Island, 200 yards from the waterline in the Port of Los Angeles.; FS 40; Batt 6; South Bureau; Council District 15; BC13 BC4 BC6 BT17 BT2 BT3 CM20 CM22 E112 E238 E248 E285 E36 E38 E40 EM13 RA112 RA36 SO1 T38 T48 T85; CH7; 13; Brian Humphrey

Knockdown - Structure Fire; INC#0556; 10:21AM; 8121 N Wilkinson Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3GgYsw0; #SunValley; *Address Correction* 32 LAFD Firefighters took just 17 minutes to access, confine and extinguish a fully involved detached (non-residential conversion) garage adjacent to a one-story home. Firefighters prevented fire extension to the adjacent home, which only sustained thermal damage to the eaves. No injury. Fire cause under investigation.; FS 89; Batt 14; Valley Bureau; Council District 2; BC12 BC14 E102 E260 E289 E472 E89 RA60 RA81 T60 T89; CH9; 17; Brian Humphrey

Structure Fire; INC#0556; 10:04AM; 8160 N Wilkinson Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/49Ptn08; #SunValley; PRELIM: Offensive fire attack at a fully involved detached (non-residential conversion) garage adjacent to a one-story home, flames threatening nearby structures.; FS 89; Batt 14; Valley Bureau; Council District 2; BC12 BC14 E102 E260 E289 E472 E89 RA60 RA81 T60 T89; CH9; 17; Brian Humphrey

Knockdown - Structure Fire; INC#1296; 05:44PM; 11865 W Rochester Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/46rKguT; #Sawtelle; 33 Firefighters took just 18 minutes to access, confine and extinguish fire within one third floor unit of a 6,029 square foot three-story garden style apartment building. No injuries. Though preliminary reports are that the fire originated in the kitchen, the specific cause of the fire has yet to be determined.; FS 59; Batt 9; West Bureau; Council District 11; BC4 BC9 E19 E237 E292 E37 E59 RA59 RA837 T37 T92; CH9; 13; Brian Humphrey

Structure Fire; INC#1296; 05:26PM; 11865 W Rochester Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/46rKguT; #Sawtelle; Three story garden-style apartment building with one third floor unit well involved with fire. ; FS 59; Batt 9; West Bureau; Council District 11; BC4 BC9 E19 E237 E292 E37 E59 RA59 RA837 T37 T92; CH9; 13; Brian Humphrey

Update Multi-Patient Traffic Collision; INC#0876; 02:00PM; 1758 W 83rd St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3QQtGPv; #ManchesterSquare; *Correction* At least *one* vehicle involved, colliding with person(s) at or near a bus stop. *Three* patients total, all in critical condition, including an adult male, an adult female, and an infant, all transported to a regional trauma center by LAFD Paramedics. There are no further details. Media Inquiries: LAPD South Traffic Division (Incident #1877); FS 57; Batt 13; South Bureau; Council District 8; BC13 E266 E57 EM11 EM13 RA257 RA266 RA57 RA857 T66; CH4; 12; Brian Humphrey

Multi-Patient Traffic Collision; INC#0876; 01:32PM; 1758 W 83rd St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3QQtGPv; #ManchesterSquare; PRELIM: Two vehicle collision with at least one pedestrian involved. Five patients total (including at least one infant). Three of the patients are in critical condition. No further details. Media Inquiries: LAPD South Traffic Division (Incident #1877); FS 57; Batt 13; South Bureau; Council District 8; BC13 E57 EM13 RA257 RA266 RA57 RA857; CH4; 12; Brian Humphrey

title.a: Greater Alarm Structure Fire - Now Out 11/23/2023 INC#0240

item.description: Greater Alarm Structure Fire - Now Out; INC#0240; 04:46AM; 5708 N Cahuenga Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/39IAzNz; #NorthHollywood; 87 Firefighters took just 28 minutes (5:14 AM) to access, confine and extinguish flames and smoke seen from the roof of a one-story commercial building, determined to be a cannabis growing operation. The blaze was confined within the premises and ventilation system. No injuries reported. The cause of the fire, and legal status of the growing operation remain under investigation.; FS 60; Batt 14; Valley Bureau; Council District 2; BC10 BC12 BC14 BC5 CM40 CM42 E102 E227 E260 E278 E287 E289 E60 E76 E77 E86 E87 E89 EM14 HR3 INSP354 RA60 RA86 RA860 RA889 RA89 SO1 SQ87 T27 T60 T78 T87 T89 UR88 UR89; CH9; 17 18; Brian Humphrey
item.category: Greater Alarm Structure Fire - Now Out
